oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Muster-in Roll
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Muster-in Roll of William W. Allen, 2nd Assistant Surgeon of the 5th Regiment of Wisconsin Infantry Volunteers. The 5th Regiment was commanded by Colonel Thomas S. Allen and called into the service of the United States by The President from the first day of October 1864 for the term of three years unless sooner discharged.
